Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at New York-New York Hotel & Casino in Las Vegas (The Strip), you'll be convenient to Crystals at City Center and University of Nevada-Las Vegas. This 4-star resort is within close proximity of The Linq and High Roller.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 2023 air-conditioned guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and a turndown service, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. Gambling sorts can try their luck at the casino, while others may prefer a nightclub or an outdoor pool. Additional amenities include wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and an arcade/game room.

Dining
Grab a bite at one of the resort's 13 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with a refreshing drink from a poolside bar or one of the 9 bars/lounges.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and express check-in. Event facilities at this resort consist of conference space and meeting rooms. Free valet parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Grab a bite at one of the resort's 13 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with a refreshing drink from a poolside bar or one of the 9 bars/lounges.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. Gambling sorts can try their luck at the casino, while others may prefer a nightclub or an outdoor pool. Additional amenities include wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and an arcade/game room.

Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and a turndown service, and housekeeping is provided daily.

With a stay at New York-New York Hotel & Casino in Las Vegas (The Strip), you'll be convenient to Crystals at City Center and University of Nevada-Las Vegas. This 4-star resort is within close proximity of The Linq and High Roller.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Crystals at City Center - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
The Linq - 1.6 km / 1 mi
High Roller - 1.6 km / 1 mi
The Auto Collections - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Bali Hai Golf Club - 2.2 km / 1.3 mi
Sands Expo Convention Center - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Welcome to Fabulous Las Vegas Sign - 2.3 km / 1.5 mi
Thomas and Mack Center - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Orleans Arena - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
National Atomic Testing Museum - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Desert Research Institute - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Fashion Show Mall - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
University of Nevada-Las Vegas - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Marjorie Barrick Museum - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Clark County Library - 3.6 km / 2.3 mi

The preferred airport for New York-New York Hotel & Casino is Las Vegas, NV (LAS-McCarran Intl.) - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for New York New York Hotel & Casino is Las Vegas, NV (LAS-McCarran Intl.) - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the propertyâ€™s location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometre.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

RoomType.text: Double Park Avenue Queen Room

Message.Text:
Essential Information:
Mandatory resort fee of approximately 41-50 USD per room perday to be paid directly to the hotel Applicable from 05/Mar/2018 to 31/Dec/9999
Please note: This hotel charges guests a daily Resort Fee of $30.00 plus tax per room, per night, payable directly to hotel. This hotel as a maximum length-of-stay of 14-nights. Reservations over 14-nights will not be accepted. this hotel is non-smoking property SELF PARKING RATES: The self-parking fee is $7 for vehicles parked over 1 hour to 4 hours and $10 for vehicles parked over 4 hours to 24 hours at the following resorts For vehicles that are self-parked at these resorts over 24 hours, there is an additional self-parking fee of $10 for each additional day or fraction of a day over the first 24 hours. VALET PARKING RATES: The valet parking fee is $13 for the first 4 hours (no grace period) and $18 for over 4 hours to 24 hours at the following resorts For vehicles that are valet parked at these resorts over 24 hours, there is an additional valet parking fee of $18 for each additional day or fraction of a day over the first 24 hours (no grace period) Early check in is not charged in any of MGM properties, however, based on availability at the property discretion Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

RoomType.text: Double Park Avenue King Room

Message.Text:
Room No: 1

The minimum age required to check in is 21 years.,Parking is available at an additional charge. Kindly contact the property for more details.,In case of early departure, guests will be responsible for the full remaining amount (room rate and tax) of the reservation.,Parking fees
Valet:
0 to 2 hours: USD 16.00
2 - 4 hours: USD 18.00
4 - 24 hours: USD 24.00

Self Park:
0 - 1 hour: Complimentary
1 - 2 hours: USD 9.00
2 - 4 hours: USD 12.00
4 - 24 hours: USD 15.00,For any bookings that are made with 2 complimentary buffets promotion, it excludes dinner and is up to a USD 75 value.

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

RoomType.text: Double Park Avenue Queen Room with View

Message.Text:
Smoking is not allowed in any of the rooms at New York New York. Smoking in the room will incur a cleaning fee of $300.00 payable directly to the hotel. Smoking is allowed in the casino area. Please note that the amount of the cleaning fee is subject to change at the hotel's discretion.

A minimum mandatory hotel-imposed fee of at least $37.00 (plus applicable tax) per room, per day, will be charged and collected by the hotel at check-in or check-out. This fee is subject to change without prior notice. The information published here is to give the client an estimate of additional fees that they may be responsible for but is not a guarantee of the final amount due. For a detailed description of what is included in the mandatory fee, please see hotel policies.

Minimum self-parking fees and valet parking fees are charged by the hour per room, per vehicle. These fees are tiered by hourly increments and collected by the hotel at check in or check out. The fee amounts are subject to change without prior notice. The information published here is to notify the client there are additional fees for parking and the hotel can provide the hourly parking rates at check-in.
